texts.es:
La  señora  Ines  de 46 años de edad, vive con su esposo  en su casa de habitación, ubicada en una aldea de San Lorenzo, valle en la zona sur de Honduras,  se dedica a la elaboración y venta de adornos de barro en donde ya tiene su cliente establecida que solo le llaman para hacerles los pedidos y comienza con la elaboración para hacer la entrega en tiempo y forma.
Doña Inés está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de más materia prima como ser barros, pintura, pinceles, moldes de adornos, ya que tiene varios pedidos y necesita tener todos los materiales para poder realizar sus artesanías para sus ventas.
Doña Inés esta muy contenta de trabajar con Prisma ya que con los préstamos que se le han dado a podido salir adelante, sueño de instalar un taller de alfarería.

San Lorenzo, Honduras –  Septiembre del 2013
texts.en:
Ines is 46 years old and lives with her husband in her own home in San Lorenzo, a valley town in southern Honduras. She creates and sells clay ornaments and has an established clientele that only have to call her to initiate the fulfillment of their orders on time and in the expected form.

Ines is requesting a loan to purchase more primary materials such as clay, paints, small paint brushes, and ornament molds, since she already has several orders and needs to have all these materials to create her artisan crafts and make these sales.

Ines is very content working with Prisma, since with her past loans, she has been able to get ahead. Her dream is to set up her own pottery shop.

loans.use: purchase clay, paint, small paintbrushes, and adornment molds for her pottery business.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El señor Wilfredo de 39 años de edad,  vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa de habitación ubicada en un barrio de San Lorenzo en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace mas de 12 años a la venta de verduras como ser sandillas, melones, tomates, naranjas, mantequilla, queso, etc.
Don Wilfredo sus clientes son personas todos los lugares que visita en su carro ya que el sale a vender a diferentes colonias y comunidades cercanas, es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante y poder prosperar en su negocio.
Don Wilfredo está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de melones, sandias, tomates, naranjas, etc. y salir a vender  a diferentes lugares y así poder mejorar los ingresos para su hogar y seguir creciendo en su negocio.

Don Wilfredo su sueño es poder graduar a sus hijos.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Septiembre del 2013
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 39, lives with his wife and children in his house, which is located in a neighborhood of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. For twelve years, he has made a living selling fruit and vegetables, such as watermelons, melons, tomatoes, and oranges, as well as butter, cheese, etc. His clients are people in the places he visits with his cart, since he travels to sell his products in different neighborhoods and nearby communities. He has a great desire to succeed and prosper with his business.

Wilfredo is applying for this loan to buy melons, watermelons, tomatoes, oranges, etc. so that he can go out to sell them in different places. He will then improve his earnings for his household and continue growing his business.

His dream is to see his children graduate.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - September 2013

loans.use: to buy melons, watermelons, tomatoes, oranges, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Buena Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “BUENA ESPERANZA”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María Angélica ella es conviviente, tiene 32 años de edad y tiene 02 hijos; La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de desayunos y venta de jugos, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le trae satisfacciones tanto económicas como personales, la socia vende jugos de platano, naranja, papaya entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de ropa, venta de cosméticos, guía de turismo, crianza de animales, artesania, preparacion de bocaditos.

Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the "Buena Esperanza" ("Good Hope") communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

María Angélica, one of the members of this group, lives with her partner and has two children. She continues to sell breakfasts and juice. She has been in this business for a good amount of time, and it gives her both personal and financial satisfaction. She sells banana, orange, and papaya juices, among others. She is a responsible and persevering person, which is how she provides for her family.

She will use this loan to buy fruit for her business.

The other members sell clothing and cosmetics, work as touristic guides, raise animals, work in artisan crafts, and make snacks.

The members who appear in the attached photos asked for permission to come late to the meeting for work-related reasons.

María Angélica is grateful to those who will become part of her dream through this loan, and she is committed to paying her installments at the established times.

loans.use: to buy fruit for her business.

loans.name: Waletor

texts.en:
Waletor lives in Sinkor in Montserrado County, where living conditions are almost like Monrovia, the capital of Liberia.  It is well known as a well laid-out place in Liberia.

Waletor is 39 years old and single, with five children between 7 and 22 years old.  For the past six years, she has been selling used clothes at the local market. She started this business with help from her boyfriend and learned this way of selling from her mother.  She spends eight hours each day on her business, and she uses taxis most of the time to get her goods to her table.

She is requesting a loan to buy more used clothes to expand her sales. She wants to get more money to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes and expand her sales

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Aminata  is 40 years old and married with 4 children aged between 10 and  21 years. She runs a general merchandise business in Tombo's western rural area in Sierra Leone. She started this business because she wants to strive for her and her families welfare.

She has been in this business since she was married and sells soda, milk, cigarettes and bread to her community.  She says that the main problem for her business is slow purchasing power during the rainy season.

Aminata requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more soda, milk, cigarettes and biscuits for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and improve her standard of living.

In the future, she would like to buy a plot of land. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more soda, milk, cigarettes and biscuits for resale

loans.name: Ana Diomaira

texts.es:
Ana Diomaira es una joven estudiante de Enfermería, ella está solicitando un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Ana Diomaira, tengo 19 años de edad, crecí y vivo en jamo la vega, nací en guacao la vega. Tengo dos hermanos y estoy soltera, y no tengo hijos, mi madre es ama de casa y mi padre es trabajador independiente.
Estudio en la universidad católica tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI), cursando la carrera de enfermería, la misma me encanta por el deseo de desenvolverme en el área de la salud, teniendo la posibilidad de curar a las personas, he tomado el 90% de las llamadas materias de colegio, dentro de estas podemos destacar ecología, media ambiente, historia dominicana, introducción a la informática, ética profesional, etc.
Necesito el préstamo por las siguientes causas: bajos recursos económicos, insuficiencia por parte de mis padres para cubrir las necesidades de la casa y porque quiero tener y/o asegurar mi carrera de una forma estable.
Si no recibiera el préstamo estaría en un gran aprieto y las posibilidades de progreso se verían reducidas, pero trataría de buscar una solución y no quedarme estancada de forma permanente.
Mis metas académicas son instruirme de manera profunda en lo que es la enfermería, para así aprovechar al máximo los conocimientos adquiridos en el transcurso de la misma.
Por otro lado las metas familiares son aportar a la salud de esta, a través de los recursos obtenidos y de mi potencial adquirido en esta aérea de la salud.
Dentro de mis metas personales se encuentran crecer profesional y siempre estar dispuestas a la hora de ayudar a cualquier paciente, sin importar raza, sexo y estatus social.
Después de haber concluido con esta carrera, me preocuparía por ocupar un puesto para poner en practica todos los conocimientos adquiridos, lograr mis metas y agradecerles a esta carrera lo aprendido ya que pienso cursar la carrera de medicina después de finalizar esta, y por ultimo trabajar como enfermera mientras me instruyo mas, en el sector de cuidados médicos-quirúrgicos.
Sin nada mas que decir, y esperando que esta solicitud sea entendida de la manera mas agradable posible, me despido de ustedes.
texts.en:
Ana Diomaira's a young nursing student.  She's requesting a loan to cover her expenses.  This is her story:

My name is Ana Diomaira.  I'm 19 years old.  I was born in Guacao, La Vega, and grew up and live in Jamo, La Vega.  I have two siblings and I'm single and have no children.  My mother's a homemaker and my father's an independent worker.

I study nursing at the Universidad Católica Tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI).  I love it because I want to immerse myself in the field of health and the possibility of curing other people.  I took 90% of the required courses in high school, including ecology, environmental studies, Dominican history, introduction to computer science, professional ethics, etc.

I need the loan for the following reasons: low economic resources, the inability of my parents to cover the household needs, and because I want to secure the stability of my educational program.  If I were not to receive this loan, I would be in a big predicament and my possibilities for advancement would be reduced.  I'd try to find a solution, however, and not stay at a standstill permanently.

My academic goals are to educate myself deeply in everything that is nursing so I can make the most of the knowledge I acquire in my program.  My family goals, on the other hand, are to contribute to my family's health through the resources I acquire and through my potential in the health field.  Among my personal goals are to grow professionally and to always be ready when it comes time to help any patient, regardless of race, gender, and social status.

After finishing this program, I would think about putting into practice all my acquired knowledge to achieve my goals.  I would be grateful to this program for what I've learned because I'm planning to study medicine after this.  Finally, I want to work as a nurse while I educate myself more in the field of medical-surgical care.

Not having anything more to say I'll take my leave, hoping you'll understand this application in the nicest possible way.

loans.use: to pay her education expenses

loans.name: José Agapito

texts.en:
José is a small dairy farmer in Hidalgo.  He lives in a region where most families earn their living through agriculture. More importantly, the farmers of the region are conservative when it comes to change. They don't adopt new technologies readily. 

José, conversely, is an innovator and willing to take risks. His cows generate hundreds of kilograms of waste daily, and he wants to take advantage of that.  His 16-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester will treat the manure to produce potent, fossil-fuel free biofertilizer and renewable biogas, allowing him to displace agrochemical fertilizer and liquefied petroleum gas. 

Jose is a pioneer and a leader.  By implementing this technology on his farm, he will show other farmers that they can concurrently save money, reduce the environmental impact of their farms, and more effectively utilize available resources. 

This loan represents 51% of the total cost of his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: to buy a 16-cubic-meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester

loans.name: Khuram

texts.ru: Хураму 53 года. Он живет, работает и воспитывает внуков в городе Турсунзаде. У Хурама имеется участок земли, на котором он трудится в течение 15 лет. Ему помогает его семья, которая состоит из 12 человек. С такой семьей ему никогда не скучно. Большую часть времени он отдает своей работе. Хурам хочет получить богатый урожай и старается для этого хорошо обработать землю. Таким образом, он неустанно стремится добиться признания в этой области. Для этой цели он просит кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений. Он надеется, что получит отличный урожай и порадует своих внуков, а также его труд признают потребители.
texts.en: Khuram is 53. He lives, works, and is raising his grandchildren in Tursun-zoda. Khuram has a plot of land which he has worked for 15 years. His family of twelve helps him. With such a large family he's never bored, and he has help. Khuram wants to reap a rich harvest so he is trying to enrich the earth. He constantly strives be the best in his field. Therefore, he is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer. He hopes that his work will yield a tremendous harvest and delight his grandchildren, and that his work will be recognized by consumers.

loans.use: buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Yorley

texts.es: Yorley es un hombre que durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a trabajar en diferentes compraventas de café, allí obtuvo experiencia y conocimiento en todo lo relacionado con la comercialización de este producto. Actualmente trabaja 2 días de la semana en la cooperativa de caficultores de la región donde reside. Para complementar los ingresos que recibe, desea iniciar con la comercialización de guayaba, pues en la cooperativa le dan la oportunidad de comprar este producto a los diferentes cultivadores, para posteriormente venderla a una compraventa que comercializa este fruto, de esta forma podrá mejorar sus ingresos para continuar llevando el sustento a su familia, conformada por su esposa y dos hijos de 5 y 8 años de edad. El cliente es un señor perseverante, activo, emprendedor y optimista, siempre va buscando opciones que le permitan salir adelante, esto lo lleva a solicitar el crédito como apoyo para iniciar su propio negocio; con el dinero comprará varios bultos de guayaba para luego venderlos a mejor precio en la comercializadora, generando un margen de ganancia favorable para mejorar su economía. Yorley sabe que debe trabajar con  dedicación y esmero para que su proyecto dé los resultados que él espera, para que le permita avanzar hacia el cumplimiento de su principal meta que es ser propietario de una compraventa de café, con lo cual podrá ofrecer a su familia un mejor bienestar y además podrá dar a sus hijos la oportunidad de tener una buena educación para que se forjen un futuro próspero.
texts.en:
Yorley has worked in various coffee businesses throughout his life, where he was able to gain experience and knowledge about the sale of this product. He currently works two days a week for a coffee growers' cooperative in his region. To complement his income, he would like to start selling guavas. At the cooperative, he has the opportunity to buy this product from various farmers, and he can then sell the guavas to a business that trades this fruit. In this way, he will be able to improve his earnings to continue providing for his family, which is made up of his wife and his two children, ages 5 and 8. 

Yorley is a persevering, active, enterprising, and optimistic man who is constantly searching for opportunities to move ahead. This has brought him to apply for a loan for support as he starts his own business. With this loan, he will buy several packages of guavas that he will later sell at a higher price to the trading company, earning a good profit to improve his finances.

Yorley knows that he needs to work with dedication and care so that his project gives him the results he hopes for so that he can progress towards his ultimate goal, which is to own a coffee trading company. He will then be able to offer his family better well-being. He will also be able to give his children the opportunity to have a good education so that they can have a prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy several packages of guavas.

loans.name: Dúo El Carmen Group

texts.es:
Duo el Carmen

Florinda de 31 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene una hija de seis años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y Ropa Americana(de segunda) desde hace un año, hace unos meses tomo la decisión de viajar a los departamentos de Guatemala para vender su mercadería de forma ambulante y asi obtener un poco mas de ganancia y le facilita el cuidado de su hija ya que puede llevarla con ella, y asi seguir ahorrando para terminar de pagar el terreno donde actualmente vive ese es el sueño mas grande que ella tiene para poder tener un techo propio,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva y usada para la venta.
texts.en:
El Carmen Duo

Florinda, 31, is a single mother with one six-year-old daughter. She has been selling new clothing and used American clothing for one year. A few months ago, she decided to travel to the departments of Guatemala to sell her merchandise as a traveling saleswoman. She can now earn a little more money and easily care for her daughter, who she can bring with her. She can then continue saving up to finish paying off the land where she currently lives, as her greatest dream is to have her own home. She is applying for this loan to buy new and used clothing which she will then sell.

loans.use: to buy new and used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Youngor

texts.en:
Youngor lives in Montserrado County, Sinkor, one of the areas in which the living conditions are almost like those of the people who live in the center of Monrovia. She is 52 years old, married to a builder and has two children, aged 20 and 31. Only one of her children is attending school and lives at home. 

She has been running a cook shop for the past 19 years now, where she sells fufu (dough made of cassava) and soup in the local market. The profit from her business is used on food and house rent. She started this business with money from her husband. She spends 8 hours each day on her business, and enjoys the response (buying) from her customers. She uses a taxi to get her goods to her cook shop. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more fufu, fish, pepper, meat, Vita (juice drink), coal, etc. for her business. Her plan is to own a car for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fufu, fish, pepper, meat, Vita, coal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Khushrat

texts.ru: Район, где живет Хусрат и ее семья является аграрным районом. Местные жители в основном занимаются земледелием и скотоводством. Хусрат более 8  лет занимается земледелием. Ей 52 года. Она замужем и имеет 2 детей. Она является основной кормилицей в семье. Для Хусрата земледелие, то есть выращивание картошки и зерна не только для нее является источником дохода, но и любимым занятием. Она с удовольствием работает на поле с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Она планирует развевать бизнес, но  не имеет денег для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Она отремонтировать свой дом, так как ее дом старый и имеет плохое состояние. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Khushrat and her family live in an agrarian region. Locals mostly farm and raise livestock. Khushrat has been farming for more than eight years She is 52 years old. She's married and has two children. She provides the main source of income for the family. Even though farming potatoes and greens is the main source of income for the family, it is also Khushrat's favorite pastime. She gladly works in the field from early morning until late at night. She is planning to expand her business, but she hasn't got money to buy seeds and fertilizer. She is renovating her home because it is quite old and in poor condition. She is asking for a loan for 5000 KGS to buy construction materials like cement, lumber, paint, etc. She is anticipating your kindness.

loans.use: buy building materials as cement, lumber, and paint for home renovation.

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo lives at Sinkor in Montserrado County, where the capital city of Liberia is located. The County is well-known as the commercial center of Liberia. Korpo is 21 years old and single. She has four children, between the ages of one and seven years. Only one of her children is attending school.

For the past nine years, Korpo has been running a sales table at the market, where she sells cassava-leaves, water-greens, and sweet-potato-greens. She started this business with help from her mother and learned this way of selling from her. Korpo likes her business, because it gives her more profits and makes her popular. She is requesting a loan to buy more produce to sell, including cassava-leaves, water-greens, and sweet-potato-greens. She wants to get more money, to build her house and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more produce to sell, including cassava-leaves, water-greens, and sweet-potato-greens.

loans.name: Gulbara

texts.ru: Гулбаре 58 лет, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитывает троих детей, а также ведет свое хозяйство. У Гулбары - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулбара занимается животноводством, стартовав 24 года назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулбары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулбара обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы с теленком. Доходы от кредита Гулбара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на проведение свадебного мероприятия сыну.
texts.en:
Gulbara is a 58-year-old widow. After the death of her husband, she was left alone to raise three children and to run her homestead. Gulbara has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Gulbara is engaged in raising livestock, having started 24 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 1,000 som KGS. Thanks to Gulbara's hard work, she today has on her homestead: two dairy cows and 20 sheep. Monthly income is 5,000 som (KGS). 

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Gulbara turned to the microfinance bank Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow with calf. 

Gulbara plans to invest income from the loan to further increase the count of domestic animals, and plans to save resources to put on a wedding celebration for her son.

loans.use: to buy a cow and calf

loans.name: Guljainat

texts.ru: Гулжайнат 31 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Гулжайнат - среднее-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулжайнат занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 12,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулжайнат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 5 овец, 1 лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулжайнат обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулжайнат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку автомашины.
texts.en: Guljainat is 31 years old, married and is raising three children with her husband. She has a professional degree, but the main source of income for the family is raising livestock. Guljainat has stared the livestock business 10 years ago with 12,000 som (KGS). Due to her hard and persistent work they now own 2 milk cows, 5 sheep and a horse. The monthly income from the herd is 6,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand her business Guljainat has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 20,000 som (KGA). She plans to use this loan to buy more sheep. Guljainat will invest the profits from this venture back into her livestock business and also hopes to eventually save enough money to buy her family a car.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Agustín

texts.es: Desde muy pequeño Agustín aprendió todo lo relacionado con la producción de café pues su padre se dedicaba a esta actividad y de él heredó el gusto por el trabajo en el campo. El café que Agustín produce es casi en su totalidad orgánico y entrega año con años toda su producción a la "Unión Regional" para que sea procesado y exportado. Para esta cosecha necesita un crédito porque contratará cortadores que lo ayuden en el trabajo de campo pues él solo no se dará abasto. Pasando la cosecha y después de haber liquidado el financiamiento a Agustín le gustaría adquirir un vehículo para utilizarlo para trabajar en el campo.
texts.en:
From a young age, Agustín learned everything about coffee production. His father worked in this business, and Agustín inherited his love for working in the fields. The coffee which Agustín produces is almost entirely organic, and he delivers his harvest to the "Regional Union" every year to be processed and exported. 

He is in need of a loan for this harvest because he will contract coffee harvesters to help him with the farm labor, since he would not be able to do it all himself. After this harvest ends and he has paid off this loan, Agustín would like to buy a vehicle to use for his work in the fields.

loans.use: to pay coffee harvesters.

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru: Наби мужчина в возрасте 48 лет женат имеет 3 детей. Он работает в консервном комбинате по изготовлению консервов из овощей и фруктов. Он работает там в качестве водителя грузовой перевозки по городу за его пределы. Жена Наби швея она шьет национальную одежду на дому. Сын Наби мечтает стать высококвалифицированным специалистом в области финансирования. Он учиться в университете на втором курсе. Он живет с родителями. Наби и жена усердно трудятся но получаемая заработная плата недостаточна для оплаты за университет. По этой причине, он хочет взять кредит чтобы заплатить за обучение сына в университете. Наби и его жена ждут поддержку от Арванд.
texts.en: Nabi is a 48 year old man with wife and three children. He works for a canning factory which produces canned fruits and vegetables. Nabi is one of the truck drivers at the factory who transports the final products in and out of town. Nabi's wife is a seamstress who makes national Tajik dresses from home. Nabi's son dreams of becoming a highly qualified professional in finance. He is now attending the university for the second year, but still lives with his parents. Nabi and his wife work hard but their combined income is not sufficient to pay the university's tuition. For this reason Nabi wants to take out a loan so that he can pay for his son's education. Nabi and his wife hope for Kiva's support.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Siguidia Group

texts.fr:
Siguidia est un regroupement de femmes du quartier  Koko de la ville de Koutiala qui   vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 33 ans, sont mariées et ont au moins 4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels, les tissus, de la restauration, de pâte d’arachide, de condiments, etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur premier prêt de groupe. 
Aicha est un membre du groupe Siguidia assise aux milieux.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des colis de tissus, draps, rideaux, couvertures. Elle se procure de ces tissus au grand marché avec les Burkinabés. Elle vend ses articles en détail et au comptant à la maison et au marché et à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Siguidia comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 155.000CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Aicha compte réaliser  170.000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Siguidia Group is an association of women from the Koko district of the city of Koutiala. They are all married and living in large traditional families with their husbands, children and other relatives. Their average age is 33 years old, and they each have at least four children. This group of women sells diverse goods, such as fabric, prepared foods, peanut paste, condiments, etc.. In order to increase the size of their operations, the members have decided to join the loan program of Soro Yiriwaso. They are on their first group loan.

Aicha is a Siguida Group member, shown seated in the center of the photo. She plans to use her loan to buy packages of fabric, sheets, curtains, and blankets. She purchases these fabrics at the large Burkinabé market. She sells her products at retail and for cash from her home and at the market to a diverse clientele.

While other members of the Siguidia Ggroup hope to earn an average income of 155,000 Francs CFA each during this cycle, Aicha hopes to earn 170,000 Francs CFA. In addition to the repayment of loans, they use part of their income to meet personal expenses and increase their business capital.

loans.use: to purchase various merchandise, including fabrics

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Активная и позитивная женщина из района Хамадони успевает во всем. Она верная жена, мама четверых детей, преподаватель с огромным стажем и начинающая бизнес woman. В свои 55 лет Зебинисо многое преуспела. Ее муж работает с ней. Вот уже несколько лет они вместе работают и живут. Любящий супруг всегда поддерживает и старается помочь Зебиниссо. Зебинисо хочет получить кредит для закупа несколько голов скота. Она будет заниматься разведением скота у себя дома. В этом ей будет помогать ее муж. Мы желаем Зебинисо успехов.
texts.en:
An active and positive woman from the Hamadoni region succeeds in everything. She is a faithful wife, the mother of four children, a teacher with great experience and a budding businesswoman. At 55, Zebiniso has achieved a lot. Her husband works with her. For several years, they have lived and worked together. Her loving husband always tries to help and support Zebiniso. 

Zebiniso wants to get a loan to buy a few head of cattle. She will be engaged in raising livestock at her home. She will be helped by her husband in this. We wish Zebiniso success.

loans.use: to purchase a calf, goats, and dairy cows

loans.name: Kanaiym

texts.ru: Канайим 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Канайим - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Канайим занимается животноводством, стартовав 18 лет назад, с покупки скота на 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Канайим, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется:6 овец, 1 лошадь. Ежемесячный доход составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Канайим обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Канайим планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на приобретение автомашины.
texts.en: Kanaiym is 51 years old, married and is raising four children with her husband. She has a high school degree and the main source of income for the family is their livestock. Kanaiym started the livestock business 18 years ago, by buying a few animals with 15,000 som (KGS). Because of her hard work and perseverance, the family now owns six sheep and a horse. The monthly profits from the animals are 8,000 som (KGS). In order to further expand the livestock business Kanaiym has turned to the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS). She will use the money to buy more sheep for the herd. Kanaiym plans to continue investing the profits from this expansion back into her livestock business and will also be saving some of the money to purchase a car.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Isery Seminou Group

texts.es:
Kasia, tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en La Ceiba, Atlántida. En busca de obtener sus propios ingresos hace  5 años inicio con su negocio de elaboración y venta de kazabe, pan de coco y atol de maíz. Ella vende este producto en su casa y en la comunidad.  Kasia esta solicitando un préstamo en forma grupal, el grupo se llama Isery  Seminou que esta formado por 5 integrantes, cada una solicita 7,000 Lempiras haciendo un total grupal por 35,000 Lempiras. Este préstamo lo utilizaran para comprar insumos como harina, coco, yuca, elotes, azúcar y otros ingredientes para la elaboración de pan, atol y Kazabe, con el objetivo de vender y obtener ingresos.  La meta que tienen es que de las ganancias van a elaborar un horno grande de mayor capacidad y que sirva para todo el grupo.
En la foto se identifican así:  a la izquierda esta Petronila de vestido rayado, sigue doña Benita, luego Juliza, Dunia y Kasia a la Derecha de camiseta blanca con bolso rosado.
texts.en:
Kasia, 29, is a single mother of two. She lives in La Ceiba, Atlántida. In search of a way to earn her own income, she started her business selling cassava bread, coconut bread, and cornflour drinks five years ago. She sells her products from her home and in her community. 

Kasia is applying for this loan with her group, which is called Isery Seminou. This group is made up of five members, each of whom is applying for 7,000 Honduran lempiras, making a group total of 35,000 lempiras. They will use this loan to buy ingredients, such as flour, coconut, yuca, sweetcorn, sugar, and others to make bread, cornflour drinks, and cassava bread, with the goal of selling these products and earning an income. Their goal is to use the earnings to build a large oven with a greater capacity that will benefit the entire group.

As they appear in the photo, the group members are: Petronila on the left in a striped dress, followed by Benita, Juliza, Dunia, and Kasia on the right with a white shirt and pink bag.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as flour, coconut, cassava, sweetcorn, sugar, and others to make bread, cornflour drinks, and cassava bread.

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Tiessiri est un regroupement de femmes de Hamdallaye de la ville de Koutiala qui se connaissent bien et qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles. Elles ont en moyenne 35 ans, sont mariées et au ont moins 3 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels, les tissus, de fruits légumes, de plastiques, des  divers, etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur neuvième prêt de groupe. 
Kadia est un membre du groupe Tiessiri 2 eme assise devant de la droite vers la gauche.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des sacs d’arachide, des maniocs et  des ignames. Elle se procure de ces produits au grand marché et elle les revend en détail et au comptant à la maison et au marché et à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Tiessiri comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 195 000CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Kadia  compte réaliser  215 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Tiessiri Group is an association of women from the Hamdallaye district of the city of Koutiala. They know one another well, and are all married and living in large traditional families. Their average age is 35 years old, and they have three or more children. This group of women sells various goods, such as fabrics, fruits and vegetables, plastics, sundries, etc.. In order to increase the size of their operations, the members have decided to join the loan program of Soro Yiriwaso. They are on their ninth group loan.

Kadia is a Tiessiri Group member, shown seated in front, second from the right. She plans to use her loan to buy bags of peanuts, cassava, and yams. She purchases her merchandise at the large market, and resells them at retail for cash, both from her home and at the market, to a diverse clientele.

While other members of the Tiessiri Group hope to earn an average income of 195,000 Francs CFA each during this cycle, Kadia hopes to earn 215,000 Francs CFA. In addition to the repayment of loans, they use part of their income to meet personal expenses and increase their business capital.

loans.use: to purchase food for resale.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a 37-year-old married woman from Bethlehem city. She lives in a very simple house with her husband and six kids, three sons and three daughters. All of them attend school. 

For the past ten years, her husband has been working in his workshop, where they make olive wood souvenirs. It is a very profitable business, but the raw materials are very expensive. Lina make sewing products at her home and sells them to the local stores in the city. 

Lina would like to improve her business by buying another sewing machine, so she took a USD loan from FATEN.

This loan will help her buy a new sewing machine for her workshop, allowing her to increase her productivity, and also her income.

Lina and her husbnad appear in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop

loans.name: Nuha

texts.en:
Nuha is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her son appears in the photo.

Nuha is a 58-year-old married woman from a small village near Ramallah city. She lives with her husband and three sons. 

For the past six years, Nuha has been working on her land where she plants some crops by using greenhouses. Her land is very fertile, so the quality of the crops is very good. She sells these fruits and vegetables in the local market and earns good money. 

Nuha took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more greenhouses to use in planting more crops and increasing her income. This will improve the family conditions.

loans.use: to buy more greenhouses to plant more crops and increase her income

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell bamboo business in the Philippines. 

Alicia successfully paid back her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of bamboo to sell.

NWTF is re-listing Alicia's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of bamboo to sell.

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

Annaliza successfully paid back her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.  She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other fishing equipment.

NWTF is re-listing Annaliza's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other fishing equipment.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 40 years old and married with six children.

Evelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

She has been in this business for ten years, and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Evelyn aspires to save enough money to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Deyvid Junior

texts.en:
Deyvid dreams of working in business administration. To achieve his goal, Deyvid has enrolled in the Universidad Autónoma Juan Misael Saracho. He expects to graduate in January 2014, but without a loan he is unsure how he will be able to continue affording his education. He shares that his alternative would be to take time off from school to work and save money until he could return. Deyvid shares that it is important to him to graduate on time so he can enter into the job market as soon as possible.

With a this loan, Deyvid plans on purchasing his much needed textbooks and school supplies. With the proper books, Deyvid feels he will be able to study more effectively and earn better grades. Deyvid currently works 30 hours a week. One of his biggest challenges has been making time to work and go to school. With a career in business, he expects to earn $14 a day. With one younger brother and one younger sister, Deyvid hopes to be a role model for his younger siblings by being the first in his family to graduate from university.

loans.use: To pay for textbooks.

loans.name: Mirna Noelia

texts.es:
Doña Mirna es una señora muy emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante la cual comparte hogar junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos quienes están en edad escolar uno cursa el primer grado y la mayor el quinto grado. Ella aprendió el rubro y oficio de la agricultura ya que desde muy pequeña apoyaba a su padre en la tierra que el cultivaba. Sus cultivos están ubicados en su misma comunidad a la cual se trasladan en vestía o caminando aproximadamente a una hora y media. Doña Mirna tiene un grado de educación primaria el cual curso solo el primer grado ya que la economía en su hogar no era la mejor en su juventud pero aprendió a trabajar fuertemente para educar sus 2 hijos y que ellos mejoren la calidad de vida de su familia. 

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos en un mejor futuro, con mejores oportunidades, mejores condiciones de vida para que puedan apoyar a su familia en todo lo necesario. por lo que ella hoy en día solicita un financiamiento con el cual mejorara sus cultivos dando una mejor asistencia aplicando insumos agrícolas como abono, fertilizantes, formula cafetalera, fungicidas que evitaran la contaminación de bichos y enfermedades.
texts.en:
Mirna is a very enterprising woman with a desire to succeed. She lives with her husband and two children, who are in the first and fifth grade. She learned about agriculture from a young age, when she supported her father on the land where he grew crops. Her crops are located in the same village, where they are transported either by animals or walking for about an hour and a half. Mirna has a primary school education. She was only able to study up to the first grade, because her family's financial situation was not the best during her childhood. However, she learned to work hard to educate her two children so that they can improve the family's quality of life.

She dreams of seeing her children have a better future with better opportunities and life circumstances, so that they can support the family in whatever they do. For this reason, she is applying for a loan which will allow her to improve her crops, giving them better care by implementing supplies such as manure, fertilizer, coffee formula, and fungicides to avoid infestation and disease.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Dilma Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Dilma tiene un grado de educación primaria completo y no pudo continuar por falta de apoyo económico por parte de sus padres ya que su economía no era la mejor para que ella pudiese continuar. Ella se casó pero con el tiempo se separó de su pareja por la falta de entendimiento con el cual procreo 6 hijos siendo ella el único apoyo para con ellos en todo lo posible. De los hijos que tiene solo 5 viven con ella porque el mayor se casó y está en hogar a parte. Los dos primeros, uno de 22 años y el otro de 19 años estudiaron comercio y ambos están desempleados, porque no han podido encontrar trabajo y lo que hacen es que le ayuda en las diferentes actividades del campo a su madre, también trabajan en otras tierras o en trabajos que salgan en la comunidad para poder obtener ingresos y así ayudar a su madre. El tercero tiene 16 años y está estudiando para técnico en electrónica. Los dos menores de 11 años y 9 años estudian en la escuela de la comunidad, quienes están en  cuarto grado y tercer grado. Ella se dedica al negocio del cultivo de café desde niña le enseñaron como se cultiva el café conocimiento que ella ha aprovechado al máximo por medio de sus padres trabajando la tierra que le heredaron sus padres. El grano al final de la cosecha lo vende en la comunidad a compradores locales e intermediarios.

Doña Dilma como meta tiene comprar más tierra para que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro y poderles brindar lo necesario para que sigan estudiando y sean personas de bien. Por lo que hoy en día solicita un financiamiento con el cual dará una mejor asistencia y un mejor mantenimiento a sus cultivos de café ya que la temporada se aproxima y quiere sacar una excelente cosecha.
texts.en:
Dilma completed primary school but was not able to continue as she had no financial support from her parents.  They did not have the money for Dilma to stay in school.  Dilma was married but she later separated from her husband as they did not get on well.  From the marriage Dilma has six children and she is the only one supporting them and is doing so as best she can.  Five of the children still live at home though the eldest is now married and has his own home.  The eldest two children that are still at home are aged 22 and 19 years old respectively.  They both studied business but are unemployed as they have been unable to find work.  They now help their mother with her work in the country.  They also work for other farmers or do other jobs that come up in the community so that they can earn more and help their mother.  The next child is 16 years old and is studying electronics.  The youngest two are 11 and 9 years old each.  They are both studying at the local school, in fourth and third grades, respectively.  Dilma, herself, has been working growing coffee since she was a girl.  She learned the most she could of her trade from her parents and she inherited their land.  Dilma sells the final product in the community and to intermediaries.

Dilma's goal is to buy more land so that he children can have a better future, and to provide them with all that is necessary so as to continue studying and become good people.  To do this Dilma is applying for a loan to support and maintain her coffee crops.  The new season is approaching and Dilma wants to have a really good harvest.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Umriniso

texts.ru: Умринисо трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и воспитывает прекрасных детей. Она уже много лет занимается земледелием, но так как она получала мало дохода от земледелия, она начала свой бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания. Она продает в своем магазине, овощи, которые она сама выращивает. Она имеет дополнительный доход от скотоводства. Умринисо всегда старается к новшеству и стремится к тому, чтобы улучшить условию проживания семьи. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Ее сын скоро женится и она должна провести свадебное торжество своего сына. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 450 долларов США для проведения свадебного торжества. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Umriniso is a hardworking woman. She is married and is raising lovely children. For many years, she has been involved in agriculture, but since she receives a small income from agriculture, she began her own business trading food products. In her own store, she sells vegetables that she grows herself. She gets additional income from livestock. 

Umriniso is always trying to innovate and is committed to ensuring the improvement of living conditions for her family. Her husband helps her to conduct the business. Her soon will soon be married and she must put on a wedding celebration for him. 

She is requesting a loan of US $450 to put on a wedding celebration.

loans.use: to make a wedding celebration for her son

loans.name: Abdulvohid

texts.ru:
Абдулвохиду 52 года. Он проживает в районе Хамадони. Абдулвохид всегда старается сделать мир лучше и добрее. Он второй раз берет кредит в Хумо. Абдулвохид занимается растениеводством. До сих пор он трудится на грядке и ему это работа доставляет колоссальное удовольствие. 
Абдулвохид ищет другие источники дополнительного дохода. На сегодняшний день он берет кредит на сумму 500 долларов США для приобретения сварочного аппарата, чтобы предоставить услуги по сварке. Когда у него будет сварочный аппарат, он сможет работат и внести в бюджет семьи дополнительный доход. Соответственно он будет совмещать работу на грядке с новой деятельностью.
texts.en:
Abdulvohid is 52 years old. He resides in the Hamadoni region. Abdulvohid is always trying to make the world better and kinder. He is taking his second loan from HUMO. Abdulvohid is involved in crop cultivation. So far he has been working in a garden and this work brings him great pleasure. 

Abdulvohid is looking for other sources of additional income. Now, he is taking a loan of US$500 to purchase a welding machine, in order to provide welding services. When he will have a welding machine, he will be able to work and to make extra income for the family budget. Accordingly, he will combine work in the garden with a new activity.

loans.use: to purchase a welding machine

loans.name: Tigidankay

texts.en:
Meet 47-year-old Tigidanky, who is from Tombo, in the Western Rural Area in Sierra Leone. She is married and has three children between the ages of 9 and 21 years. Her children are currently attending school. In 2009, Tigidankay established her bread business. She began her business because she wanted to get a source of income to support the home. She works at the business 10 hours per day, 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is sometimes, the purchasing power of customers is very low.

Tigidanky requires a loan, in order to purchase flour and sugar. She will use those ingredients to prepare her bread to sell. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and improve her standard of living. In the future, Tigidanky plans to open a big provisions shop. She thanks you for your support

loans.use: to purchase flour and sugar, with which she will prepare her bread

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia has an enormous passion and vision for providing children between the ages of 2 and 13 with children’s amusement. She wants to help children develop their social skills and independence, with a focus on children with autism. “I have a six year old with autism. My husband and I feel that there is a need for different types of children’s entertainment, besides the typical bounce houses,” says Alicia.

She also has a dream of starting her own business. She has been a stay-at-home mom caring for her children and is ready to start a new career. Proceeds will help her acquire four motorized portable electrical animals, which are coin-operated and fully controllable by children. She will also purchase portable flooring, two canopies, plastic fencing, a mobile generator, and a trailer to haul the equipment. The arena will consist of portable flooring that can easily be snapped together. Canopies will provide shade to riders, and plastic guardrails will enclose the 20 ft. x 30 ft. structure. She will set up a mobile arena for the rides at local flea markets, birthday parties, festivals, and other community events. Her husband will help her in the business.

She had been turned down by several banks prior to applying with Fresno CDFI due to the fact that the business is a start-up and she is offering a unique product that does not currently exist in the local market. The $10,000 loan will help her start the business and develop a business banking relationship.

loans.use: To purchase equipment for a childrens' amusement ride.

loans.name: Gulayim

texts.ru: Гулайим 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Гулайим - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулайим занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулайим, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулайим обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулайим планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку автомашины.
texts.en: Gulayim is 38 years old, married and is raising four children with her husband. Gulayim has a professional degree and raises livestock as a main source of income for her family. She started her business 10 years ago, using 10,000 som (KGS) to purchase cattle. Because to her hard work Gulayim now owns two milk cows and five sheep and the business makes 5,000 som (KGS) a month. In order to expand her business Gulayim has turned to the micro-loan bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS). She will use the money to purchase sheep. She plans to use the profits from the expansion to buy even more animals and hopes to save enough to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy sheep

loans.name: Abdukarim

texts.ru:
Все художники разные, кто- то свои идеи воплощает с помощью кисти, кто-то в музыке, на ткани или в алебастре. Они все отличаются, но объединяет их одно, свобода самовыражения. Один из таких людей Абдукарим. Он проживает в городе Курган-Тюбе. Он создает свои рисунки гравируя их на стенках национальной колыбельки, которые производит сам, своими руками. Абдукарим мастер своего дела. Его гравированные стенки - это шедевры искусства. Абдукарим любит свое дело и старается, чтоб каждое последующая работа была лучшей предыдущей. Создать и гравировать колыбельки очень трудная работа, но Абдукарим так влюблен в свою работу, что не замечает, как пролетает время. На сегодняшний день у Абдукарима закончились запасы древесины и ему срочно необходимо пополнить их. 
Абдукарим берет кредит для приобретения древесины. Он надеется, что полученных денег хватит для закупа сырья, и он снова вернется в свое любимое дело.
texts.en:
All artists are different: Some embody their ideas with the help of brushes, some with music, some on cloth or on alabaster. They are all different, but one thing unites them: Freedom of expression. One of these people is Abdukarim. He lives in the Qurgan-Tube region. He creates his paintings though engraving them on the sides of the national crib, which he produces himself, with his own hands.

Abdukarim is a master in his work. His engravings are masterpieces of art. Abdukarim loves his work and strives for each subsequent piece of work being better than the previous. To create and engrave cribs is very hard work, but Abdukarim loves his work so much that he doesn't notice that time flies. Currently Abdukarim has used up all his wood resources and he urgently needs to replenish them. 

Abdukarim takes a loan to purchase wood. He hopes that the money received is enough to purchase material, and that he again can return to his beloved work.

loans.use: to purchase wood in order to produce cribs

loans.name: Korpo

texts.en:
Korpo lives at Sinkor, in Montserrado County, where the capital city of Liberia is located. The County is well known as the commercial center of Liberia. Korpo is 42 years old, and she has three children between the ages of 8 and 26 years.

For the past two years, she has been running a sales table at the market, where she sells rice, pepper, bitter-ball, Vita, and other items. She started this business with help from her boyfriend and learned this way of selling from him. She likes her business, because it gives her more profits. She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, pepper, bitter-ball, Vita and other items, for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, bitter-ball, and other food ingredients to sell at the market

loans.name: Debbie

texts.en:
Competing with the family business, Debbie (right) paints and resurfaces apartment complexes. Originally from Monterrey, Mexico, Debbie’s family has a painting company, too. They moved to Austin, Texas where she currently services three different properties along with her business partner, Elda (left).

According to their business plan, the mission of C&E Painting, LLC is to give exceptional customer service and work, and to be perfect at each task while providing compassion and integrity, all within deadline.

Together, the girls are working to brand their business in hopes that they will complete a website, create business cards, and market their business on Craigslist.com and Angie’s List. However, before they are able to reach those long-term business goals, they began searching for a business loan.

Turning to BIG Austin, a community partner, the girls were referred to Accion Texas Inc. After applying and being approved for a loan, they purchased business insurance and purchased tools to decrease the amount of work on their end and increase their possible clientele. With the help of the loan, Debbie and Elda plan to exceed $10,000 profit within 12 months.

loans.use: to purchase business insurance and tools to decrease the amount of work on their end and increase their possible clientele.

loans.name: Atakhon

texts.ru: Атахон целеустремленный и современный молодой человек. Ему 18 лет. Он в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Худжандский Государственный Университет в факультет Физика и математика. Он успешно учится в университете и имеет хорошую репутацию среди сокурсников. Он помогает родителям по выращиванию картошки и пшеницы. Он мечтает в будущем стать высококвалифицированным специалистом. Атахон запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Atakhon is a driven and modern young man. He is 18 years old. This year, he successfully graduated from high school and enrolled in Khujand State University in the department of physics and mathematics. He is successfully studying at the university and has a good reputation among his fellow students. He helps his parents to grow potatoes and wheat. 

He dreams of becoming a highly qualified specialist. 

Atakhon is requesting a loan to pay for tuition.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Sabrina

texts.ru: Сабрине 18 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Сабрина в этом году успешно окончила среднюю школу и поступила в Институт Экономики и Финансы по специальности Технолог. Она в школе учила отлично все предметы и активно участвовала во всех мероприятиях. Она в университете тоже учится хорошо. Ее родители простые рабочие и не имеют денег, чтобы оплатить за учебный договор. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора в университете. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Sabrina is 18 years old. She is not married and lives with her parents. This year, Sabrina successfully completed high school and enrolled in the Institute of Economics and Finance with the Technology specialty. She studied well in school in all her subjects and active participated in all the activities. She is also a good student in the university. 

Her parents are simple workers and do not have money to pay for tuition. She is requesting a loan to pay tuition at the university.

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru: Шоира жизнерадостная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Детям 10 и 15 лет. Ее муж занимается собственным бизнесом. Шоира много лет помогала своему мужу по введению бизнеса. Она всегда мечтала открыть собственный бизнес. Она начала свой бизнес в 1998 года. Шоира открыла свою столовую. Она сама готовит блюдо. Она имеет большой опыт и развевает свой бизнес. Шоира хочет расширить свой бизнес. Она должна увеличить оборотный капитал и отремонтировать свою столовую. Шоира запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания, и отремонтировать столовую. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Shoira is a cheerful woman. She is married and is raising two children. The children are aged 10 and 15. 

Her husband is involved in his own business. For many years, Shoira helped her husband in conducting his business. She always dreamed of opening her own business. She began her own business in 1998. Shoira opened her own cafe. She does the cooking herself. She has a lot of experience and is developing her business Shoira wants to expand her business. She must increase her working capital and renovate her cafe. 

Shoira is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase food products and to repair her cafe.

loans.use: to buy food items for increasing working capital and to repair her café

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Лариса – из Мелитополя. Она торгует женской одеждой на одном из местных рынков. У нее давно свое собственное торговое место, опыт работы – 17 лет. 
Лариса планирует закупить партию товара на 10 000 гривен для реализации в осеннее время года, а именно, кофты, блузы, юбки и прочее. Ларисе нравится развиваться и профессионально расти, она планирует и в дальнейшем вкладывать силы и финансы в свое дело, постепенно расширяя его.
texts.en:
Larisa is from Melitopol. She trades women's clothing in one of the local markets. She has had her own trade spot for a long time; her work experience spans 17 years.
 
Larisa plans to buy a parcel of goods for 10,000 hryvnia to be sold in the autumn, namely sweaters, blouses, skirts, and more. Larisa likes to develop and grow professionally. She plans to continue to invest her efforts and finances in the business, gradually expanding it.

loans.use: to purchase sweaters, blouses and skirts for seasonal trade

loans.name: Bruno Douglas

texts.en:
Bruno has always dreamt of becoming a leader in international business. He was accepted into the Universidad Tecnológica Boliviana, and now with the chance to achieve his dream, is concerned about affording tuition fees. He plans on graduating in January, 2016, but without a loan from Vittana, he thinks that he may need to take time off to work and save until he can return to school. 

Bruno plans on spending the loan towards purchasing his textbooks. As an added expense, textbooks are often not bought to save money. With them, Bruno hopes to be able to better understand his subjects. With three younger sisters, Bruno hopes to be a role model for his younger siblings by being the first in his family to graduate from university.

loans.use: to pay for books and school supplies.

loans.name: Ranogul

texts.ru: Раногул 51 год. Родом она из города Вахдат, который находится в юго-западной части Таджикистана. Раногул живет с сыном и дочкой. Ее муж находится на заработках в России. Но он никогда не забывет своих родных. Он очень любит свою семью, своих детей красивую дочку - мамину помощницу, умного сына - мужчину дома, и любящею жену, которая ждет его дома. Пока муж Раногул вдали, она стареться обеспечить своих детей всем. Раногул работает в ателье портнихой. Она начала работу в этой области, когда ей было 40 лет. Шить, кроить и создавать новые образы, радовать взгляды людей своей одеждой и наблюдать восторженные лица клиенток ей очень понравилось. Уже 11 лет она занимается этим видом деятельности. Сейчас она принимает заказы в ателье, но хочет работать и дома ближе к детям. Швейная машина, на которой она работает, принадлежит ателье. Чтобы купить новую машину, другие виды принадлежностей и продолжить свою работу, ей нужны средства, которых у нее нет. Поэтому она берет кредит. Раногул хочет работать и обеспечить своих детей и одновременно быть рядом с ними.
texts.en: Ranogul is 51 years old. She was born in Vahdat which is located in south-western Tajikistan. Ranogul lives with her son and daughter, while her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. Even though he is far away, Ranogul's husband never forgets about his family and he loves them all dearly: his beautiful daughter - mother's helper, his son - the man of the house and his beautiful wife who waits for him at home. While Ranogul's husband is away, she tries her best to provide her children with all the necessities. Ranogul works in a fashion studio as a seamstress. She started working in this area when she turned 40 years old. Ranogul can sew, draft and design new patterns, and her clothes make others happy. The best reward for Ranogul is to see the excited expressions on the faces of her clients when they try on her designs.  Ranogul has been working as a seamstress and fashion designer for 11 years. She still takes her orders through the fashion studio, but wants to also be able to work at home, so that she can be close to her children. The sewing machine that Ranogul uses in the studio belongs to the studio. So that she can buy her own sewing machine and all the accessories and be able to continue working while home Ranogul needs money, but all her income is spent on her family. That is why Ranogul decided to take out this loan. She wants to work and better provide for her children and also be near them.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and accessories

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to renew and clear his farm.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина работает медсестрой в больнице. Зарабатывает немного, денег хватает только на самое основное, хотя работают вместе с мужем.
Сумму в 20 000 гривен Ирина планирует вложить в ремонт дома. Ее муж работает шлифовщиком в частной фирме, занимается внутриотделочными работами. Он собирается сделать ремонт сам, просто нет денег на отделочные материалы. Муж Ирины планирует сделать ремонт с нуля в 2-х комнатах, так как в спальне и кухне нет ни штукатурки, ни стяжки.
texts.en:
Irina works as a nurse in a hospital. She earns a small living and the money is only enough for the basics, despite the fact that she and her husband are both working. 

Irina plans to invest the amount of 20,000 hryvnia in home repairs в ремонт дома. Her husband works as a sander in a private company, involved in finishing works. He is going to make the repairs himself, just does not have the money for finishing materials. Irina's husband plans to renovate from scratch in two rooms, as the bedroom and kitchen have neither plaster nor screed.

loans.use: to remodel two rooms in her house

loans.name: Boturjon

texts.ru: Ботурджон уроженец района Хуросон. Ему 40 лет. Ботурджон последние 5 лет работает в школе завхозом. Но основной доход получает он животноводство. В Таджикистане зарплата учителей и работников школы очень маленькая. С зарплатой завхоза, Ботурджон не сможет покормить большую семью. У него пожилые родители, жена домохозяйка и четыре несовершеннолетних детей. Большую часть времени Ботурджон проводит на скотном дворе, присматривая за коровами, козами и новорожденными барашками. Правильно разводить скот его научили отец и дед. Этот урок Ботурджон использует более 25 лет. За что он до сих пор им благодарен. У него малое количество крупнорогатого скота и он хочет купит быков, и разводить их. По этой причине он берет кредит. Благодаря полученному кредиту он сможет реализовать задуманное и будет ждать не только появление барашек, но и телят.
texts.en: Boturjon lives in Khuroson region. He is 40 years old. For the last five years Boturjon has worked as a manager of the local school. However, the main source of income is Boturjon's livestock business. In Tajikistan the salaries of school teachers and school staff are miniscule. His salary as a manger would not allow Boturjon to feed his large family - his aging parents, his stay-at-home wife and four young children. Most of Boturjon's time is spent with his livestock, taking care of the cows, goats and baby lambs. He has learned to take good care of his animals from his father and grandfather and has been using those lessons for 25 years. He is still thanks full to his elders for the knowledge. Boturjon owns only a few heads of cattle and wants to breed them, so he has decided to take out this loan. This loan will allow Boturjon to not only take care of baby lambs but also raise baby calves.

loans.use: to expand his herd

loans.name: Elma

texts.en: Elma is 43 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family by running a general store in the Philippines, and has requested a loan for PHP 15,000 from NWTF to buy more items like bread, soft drinks, noodles, sardines and other groceries. Elma has borrowed and repaid 13 loans from NWTF prior to this one. She has run her general store for 15 years and supplements her income by selling food. Her goal is to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more items like bread, soft drinks, noodles, sardines and other groceries.

loans.name: Ainur

texts.ru: Айнуре 43 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Айнуры - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи  Айнура занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду  Айнуры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 32 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства,  Айнура обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита  Айнура планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Ainur is 43, married, and has four kids. She has a high school education and provides the main source of income for her family. Ainur raises farm animals, which she began doing 10 years ago when she bought cattle for 15,000 som. In the hope of expanding her farm, Ainur asked Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som in order to buy more cattle. She plans to use the profits from this loan to buy additional cattle in the future and to buy supplies to repair her house.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.ru: Сорокалетний Юсуф из города Куляб района Восеъ, гордо носит статус бизнесмена, продавца, брата, сына и просто хорошего человека, надежного друга. У Юсуфа имеется магазин техники, где он раньше торговал техникой и сейчас со своим братом хочет восстановить этот бизнес. Они собираются продавать мобильные телефоны и их запчасти. На этот шаг его толкнул тяга знать все новое и новейшие приборы в мире техники и технологии. Юсуф хочет привести из Душанбе - столицы Таджикистана мобильные телефоны и запчасти новой технологии, чтоб его маленький район Восеъ продвинулся и мобилизовался. С такой мечтой и надеждой они пошли в "Хумо" и попросили кредит. Юсуф надеется, что он сможет снова восстановить бизнес и сделать мобильную связь для жителей района легкодоступным.
texts.en:
Yusuf is in his forties and from the city of Kuljab in the Vose region. He is proud of his status as a business man, sales man, brother, son and is simply a good person and a reliable friend. Yusuf has an electronics store, where he used to sell electronics. Currently he and his brother want to reestablish this business. They decided to sell mobile phones and their accessories. His craving to know everything new and the latest devices in the world of electronics and technology pushed him to this step. 

Yusuf would like to bring mobile phones and accessories for this new technology from Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan, so that his small region, Vose, moves along and become "mobilized". With this dream and hope they went to Humo and requested a loan. Yusuf hopes that he will again be able to establish his business and make mobile communication easily available to the residents of the region.

loans.use: to purchase mobile phones in order to make mobile communication available

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
Historia mujeres Activas

Maribel es madre soltera de cinco hijos ( 22, 18, 16, 14,9) ella se dedica a la venta de utiles escolares y regalitos para toda ocasión actualmente tiene una computadora para realizar trabajos a los niños para los colegios, ella inicio su negocio hace dos años y medio, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de ropa, pero debido a la baja de ingresos que este le generaba decidió invertir en su miscelania y librería la cual atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes, ella solicita el crédito a Fape para seguir invirtiendo ya que este es el segundo crédito que ella solicita, y le gusta mucho la forma de trabajar con la institución, ella agradece a Dios por todas sus bendiciones ya que ella quiere que su hija la menor siga estudiando para terminar una carrera a nivel medio.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Activas Story

Maribel is a single mother of five children ( 22, 18, 16, 14, and 9). She sells school supplies and gifts for all occasions. Right now she has a computer to do schoolwork for the children in high school. She started this business two years and a half ago. Previously, she sold clothes, but due to the low income this generated, she decided yo invest in a variety store where she serves customers in a very friendly way. She is asking for the loan from Fape to keep investing. This is the second credit that she has asked for and she really likes how she works with the institution. She is grateful to God for all of the blessings, since she wants for her youngest daughter to stay in school and finish college.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her bookstore.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony has owned Love Your Body for more than a decade in San Antonio, Texas. Originally from Emory, Texas, just east of Dallas, Anthony moved to San Antonio and began his retail business.

Anthony sells bath and body products made from the best ingredients, which ensure a silky smooth feel after using them. One particular lotion is made from African shea butter, which is derived from the nut of the African shea tree. The rich fatty acid is crucial to rejuvenating and moisturizing the skin.  Shea butter provides all the essential vitamins needed to make skin feel and look smoother and softer.

Anthony offers many other bath and body products and sets up shop at a local market on the south side of San Antonio. He was able to continue selling his products with the help from Accion Texas Inc., America’s largest microlender dedicated to helping small business owners and entrepreneurs. He discovered Accion while reading the local newspaper. He inquired about applying for a loan and received an approval shortly after completing the loan application process.

The Accion loan allowed Anthony to purchase additional product to sell, retain his one full-time employee, and begin taking steps to hire an additional part-time employee, too.  Anthony continues to sell at the local market in San Antonio and grow his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell, retain his one full-time employee, and begin taking steps to hire an additional part-time employee.

loans.name: Viktor

texts.ru:
Виктор – из Мелитополя. Он – вдовец, у него двое взрослых детей. Виктор занимается строительными услугами, производством бетонно-керамических изделий. Сейчас строит церковь недалеко от города. 
Виктору необходима сумма в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы сделать ремонт погрузчика и инструмента, а также купить новый инструмент, так как количество наемных рабочих увеличилось из-за объема работы.
texts.en:
Viktor is from Melitopol. He is a widower and has two grown children. Viktor is involved in construction services, the production of concrete and ceramic products. Now, he is building a church not far from the town.

Viktor needs a sum of 10,000 hryvnia to make repairs to his truck and tools, as well as to buy a new tool as the number of hired workers has increased because of workload.

loans.use: to purchase new tools and repair some of his instruments

loans.name: Dodkhokul

texts.ru: Додхокул с семьей живет в Яване. Яван - маленький район. Жители этого района славятся своим гостеприимством, вежливостью и самое главное трудолюбивым духом. Додхокул из таких людей кто работает, трудиться, зарабатывает и кормит свою семью честно нажитым трудом. Он старается во всем преуспеть и призирает лень. Такими он воспитал своих детей и в будущем воспитает внуков. Додхокулу 68 лет он сам до сих пор работает на грядке. Трудолюбивым духом этого человека можно только позавидовать. Додхокул большую часть времени тратит на земле, но также он успевает ремонтировать машины. Ведь он по профессии механик и работает по специальности более 52 лет. Но основным его делом остается сельское хозяйство. Додхокул собирается развить свой бизнес и приобрести минеральные удобрения, горючей смеси для улучшения своего урожая. По такой причине он берет кредит. От полученной прибыли в будущем Додхокул сможет помочь племяннику сыграть свадьбу.
texts.en: Dodkhokul lives with his family in Yavan. Yavan is a small region. People of Yavan are famous for their hospitality, politeness and, most importantly, their hard work. Dodkhokul is one of those people who likes working hard and be able to take care of his family with honest work. He always tried to be successful and despises laziness. He has raised his children to be hard working and in the future will instill his work ethic in his grand kids as well. Dodkhokul is 68 years old, but he still works out on his fields. One can only envy the industrious spirit of this man! Most of his time is spent tending his crops, but he also manages to find time to repair cars and tractors. Dodkhokul is a trained auto-mechanic and worked in this profession for 52 years. However, his main occupation has always been farming. Dodkhokul wants to expand his business and needs to purchase fertilizer and fuel so that he can improve his future harvest. For this reason Dodkhokul is taking out this loan. He plans to use the profits from this venture to help his nephew pay for his wedding.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fuel and assure a bountiful harvest

loans.name: Fernando Jhonnathan

texts.en:
Fernando dreams of working in the hospitality industry, but without a degree, he knows it may never be possible. Fernando is currently attending the Universidad Los Andes, working towards his degree. He plans on graduating in February 2014, but without a loan from Vittana, he thinks that he may need to take time off to work and save until he can return to school.
