Con deseos de mejorar su vivienda se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un préstamo y comprar materiales como cemento, hierro, grava, etc. Que le permitan cambiar las columnas de madera existentes de su vivienda, y hacerlos de concreto; cemento, arena, grava y hierro como base para que su casa se mantenga firme. Desea ir mejorando poco a poco su casa y posteriormente construir paredes de bloques de concreto.
texts.en:
Dina, who is 45 years old, lives with her family, which comprises her husband, their children, and a grandson. She is a very hardworking woman who has never let life's adversities overcome her. The house she currently lives in is humble, but her own. She has been working as a housekeeper for several years, and that is how she makes an honest living. 

Wanting to improve her home, she approached FUSAI to request a loan to buy materials like cement, iron, gravel, etc. in order to replace the existing wood pillars in her home. She will build new ones out of concrete made with cement, sand, gravel, and iron as a base for her house to have a solid structure. She wants to improve her home little by little and eventually build walls out of concrete blocks.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement, iron, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Roxana Jackeline

texts.es: Roxana Jackeline de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijos, una niña de trece años y un niño de doce años en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo, venta de ropa, es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable, y muy audaz, sabe aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, para Roxana es muy importante su familia y el hogar, desde hace algún tiempo surgió la necesidad de realizar unos arreglos a la vivienda para mayor comodidad, desea colocar ladrillo al piso de la habitación y también quiere encementar el patio, para evitar el polvo y así mantener más limpia la casa, quiere empezar con el trabajo lo más rápido posible pero debido a sus escasos recursos económicos, no puede costear los gastos por eso decidió solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena, entre otros. Roxana Jackeline se siente muy contenta con la ayuda y se compromete a cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Roxana Jackeline, 32, lives in her own house with her two children, a 13-year-old girl and a 12-year-old boy.   She works selling clothes via catalog.  She’s a very hardworking, responsible, bold woman who knows how to take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself.  For Roxana, her home and family are very important.

Some time ago the need arose to make some home improvements for more comfort.  She wants to install a brick floor in the bedroom and she also wants to cement the patio to avoid dust and be able to keep the house cleaner.  She’d like to start the project as quickly as possible but due to the lack of economic resources she can’t cover the cost.  This is why she decided to ask FUSAI for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy floor bricks, cement and sand, among others.  Roxana Jackeline feels very happy with the support and commits to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Patricia Carolina

texts.es: Patricia de 20 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en casa humilde pero propia. Es una joven muy trabajadora y visionaria que se ha caracteriza a su corta edad por siempre ser responsable, siempre le ayuda a sus padres ya que tienen un pequeño negocio de hacer y confeccionar hamacas desde pequeña le gustó aprender y hoy en día es la que lleva mejor el negocio. Patricia desea con mucha ilusión la construcción de su propio cuarto de habitación, es por eso que solicitó a FUSAI un préstamo para el pago de la mano de obra y los materiales de construcción como ladrillo de barro, cemento, grava, hierro etc. Espera que sea lo más pronto posible así se sentirá feliz y satisfecha de su sueño.
texts.en:
Patricia, 20, lives with her parents in a house that though humble is theirs.  She’s a very hardworking, forward-looking young woman who at her young age is noted for being responsible.  She always helps her parents since they have a small hammock-making business and she enjoyed learning when still young and at present she’s the one who best manages the business.

Paticia is very hopeful of being able to build her own bedroom and this is why she requested a loan from FUSAI to pay labor costs and to buy building supplies like clay bricks, cement, gravel, iron, etc.  She hopes this will happen as soon as possible so she’ll feel happy and satisfied with her dream.

loans.use: to buy building supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Ma. Janeta

texts.en:
This is Ma. Janeta, 45, a resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. Her partner is Remegio, a businessman. Ma. Janeta is a mother to her three children. She, together with her partner, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Ma. Janeta sells peanuts. She buys raw peanuts, fries them and then sells them in front of their variety store. At her store she sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. She earns a minimum of 2,500 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php35,000 loan. She will use it to buy peanuts. She will also use the loan to buy grocery items and toiletries.  

Ma. Janeta hopes to give her family a comfortable life. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and also draw strength and inspiration by studying the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for more peanuts needed in her business.

loans.name: Munkhbayasgalan

texts.en: Mrs. Munkhbayasgalan, 38 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a house on a plot of land. She has been working as a bookkeeper in a building company for one year. Her husband provides taxi service to the local people. The house they live in was built last year. Due to a lack of capital, they haven't finished the roof. So she is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase shingles and planks. After completing the roof repair, the family will live in a comfortable and warm place without worrying about the coming winter. Also they will burn less coal by minimizing heat loss through the roof. Reducing coal usage has a positive impact on the environment as fewer pollutants are released into the atmosphere.

loans.use: to purchase shingles and planks.

loans.name: Khin

texts.en:
Khin is 53 years old. She was born on a family farm and only finished her education at a primary class level due to the financial limits of her family. She is married to a local farmer and has eight children. She is a farmer who cultivates rice and raises hog in the Kampong Thom province. The whole community helps each other to finish the farm work at the right time during a rainy season. She has been in agriculture for years--it has been a main source of her family’s income.

She has applied for a loan, which she will use to buy a motorcycle to support her two children in commuting to their workplaces. She mentioned that, being a good mother, she has to help all her children as much as she can, so as to give them a better quality of life. She awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to support her two children in commuting to their workplaces.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is married with five children and resides in the village of Aurora in Zamboanga del Sur. Her husband is a farmer, and provides their main source of income. Gloria runs a retail store to earn a living. She took a loan from Gata Daku MPC micro credit to buy more items like slippers and plasticware. She plans to use her profits to improve her working capital to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like slippers and plasticware.

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Она родилась в 1978 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Рано целеустремленная женщина, которая старается для благо получения своей семьи. Она более 5 лет занимается собственным бизнесом, так как доход ее мужа не хватает для содержания семьи. Она торгует на местном рынке женской одеждой. Рано коммуникабельная женщина и поэтому ей легко общаться с клиентами и привлечь больше клиентов. Она должна обновить товар на новый осенний сезон и с такой целью она обратилась за займом в сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки женской одежды. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Rano is a hardworking and ambitious woman. She was born in 1978. She is married and is raising three children. Rano is a determined woman who is trying to obtain benefits for her family. For more than five years, she has been involved in her own business, since her husband's income is not enough to support the family. She trades women's clothing at the local market. Rano is a sociable woman and therefore it is easy for her to communicate with her customers and to attract more customers. 

She must update her goods for the new fall season and with this aim she applied for a loan of US$3,000 to buy women's clothing.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes for the new season

loans.name: Roxana Marisol

texts.es: Roxana Marisol de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijos uno de 17 años y una de 19 años en casa propia. Ella se gana el sustento diario con un pequeño chalet en el que trabaja desde muy temprano; es una mujer entregada a su labor y muy humilde, lo más importante en su vida es la familia y como toda buena madre quiere lo mejor para sus hijos, tienen una pequeña vivienda en una zona rural, necesita algunas reparaciones en el baño y también en su cocina de leña pero para ello necesita algunos materiales que no puede costear por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillos, arena, hierro, para levantar paredes en el baño y para elaborar una cocina más resistente. Roxana está muy agradecida con la ayuda y asegura que cancelara la deuda.
texts.en:
Roxana Marisol, 38, lives with her two children, a 17-year-old boy and a 19-year-old girl, in her own house.  She earns her daily sustenance with a small food stand she starts working in very early.  She’s a very humble woman who is dedicated to her work.  Her family is the most important thing in her life and like all good mothers she wants the best for her children.

She owns a small house in a rural zone.  It needs some repairs in the bathroom.  In addition, her stove is wood-burning so she needs some materials but she can’t afford them which is why she’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, bricks, sand and iron rods to erect walls in the bathroom and to build a more resistant stove.  Roxana’s very grateful for the help and guarantees that she’ll repay it.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Maria Olinda

texts.es: María Olinda de cuarenta y tres años de edad es una mujer soltera que vive en casa propia desde hace 43 años, ella trabaja en una panadería y por las tardes vende antojitos típicos, además los fines de semana vende panes rellenos, María es muy trabajadora y responsable, siempre está buscando alternativas que le den la oportunidad de salir adelante, desde hace algún tiempo necesita construir un cuarto de ladrillo y laminas, en el patio de su vivienda, desea poder realizar este trabajo lo más rápido que se pueda, pues para ella es algo indispensable, pero no cuenta con la solvencia económica suficiente para costear los gastos, por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar los materiales cemento, grava, arena, ladrillo, lamina galvanizada entre otros. María Olinda se compromete a pagar toda la deuda ya que está muy agradecida con la ayuda.
texts.en:
María Olinda, 43, is a single woman living in her own house for 43 years.  She works in a bakery and in the evening sells traditional fast-food.   Also, on the weekend she sells filled bread rolls.  María is very hardworking and responsible.  She’s always seeking alternatives that will give her ways of moving forward.  

For some time now she’s needed to build a brick and metal sheeting room in her patio.  She’d like to do this project as quickly as possible because it’s indispensable for her but she does not have enough economic solvency to cover the costs which is why she’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, gravel, sand, bricks and galvanized metal sheets, among others.  María Olinda commits to repay the loan since she’s very grateful for the help.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married mother of eleven children, Teresita works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store. Teresita is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 26 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Melve

texts.en:
Melve is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a general store in the Philippines, and earns additional income from tailoring and fishing. Melve is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell to her customers.

Melve has been sustaining her business activities through the past 16 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Lyubov

texts.ru: Любовь родилась в 1958 года. Она женщина с доброй душой. Любовь пережила много трудностей в жизни. Она вышла замуж и родила 2 детей, но вскоре ее муж умер, и она осталась вдовой. Ее дети совершеннолетние. Любовь старается, чтобы ее дети жили в достатке и счастлива. Она работает в государственной организации. Любовь получает маленькую зарплату, и ее зарплата не хватает, чтобы сделать сбережения и женить сына. Ее сыну 24 года и он хочет жениться на любимой девушки. Любовь запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для проведения свадебного мероприятия сына. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Lyubov was born in 1958. She is a woman with a good heart. Lyubov has survived many difficulties in her life. She got married and had two children, but soon her husband died and she was left a widow. Her children are grown. Lyubov is trying for her children to live in prosperity and happiness. She works in a government organization. 

Lyubov receives a small salary and it is not enough to save up and put on a wedding for her son. Her son is 24 years old and wants to get married to a lovely young woman. 

Lyubov is requesting a loan of 2,500 somoni to put on a wedding celebration for her son.

loans.use: to put on a wedding celebration for her son

loans.name: Abduaziz

texts.ru: Абдуазиз порядочный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Абдуазиз работает в частном колбасном цехе. Он всегда мечтал, чтобы его дети получили высшее образование. Его сын учится в университете. Его дочь Фарангис в этом году успешно окончила среднюю школу и поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет Политики и Бизнеса по специальности Бухгалтер и Аудит. Она учится отлично. Абдуазиз должен оплатить за учебный договор свой дочери и с такой целью он запрашивает займ. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Abduaziz is a decent man. He is married with three children. Abduaziz works in a private sausage factory. He always dreamed that his children would receive a higher education. His son is studying in the university. 

This year, his daughter Farangis successfully graduated from high school and enrolled in the Tajik State University of Politics and Business with a specialty in accounting and audit. She is an excellent student. 

Abduaziz must pay tuition for his daughter and with this aim is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Jorge Ardiles

texts.es: Jorge Ardiles de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su pequeño hijo y su abuela en casa propia desde hace tres años. El se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado en diferentes lugares de la zona, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su trabajo y a su familia, Jorge siempre ha buscado en la medida de sus posibilidades darles lo que necesitan comodidad y seguridad en su vivienda el techo necesita ser reparado ya que se filtra el agua cada vez que llueve, desea empezar el trabajo lo más pronto posible porque las goteras son muchas; pero debido a su condición económica no posee de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada, cemento, polines. Jorge Ardiles está muy contento con la ayuda y se siente comprometido a cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Jorge Ardiles, 28, has lived in his own house for the last three years with his grandmother and his little boy.  He works buying and selling cattle in various places in the zone.  He’s an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and to his family.  Within the limits of his possibilities, Jorge is always looking for ways of giving them what they need: comfort and security at home.

The roof needs to be repaired because water leaks in every time it rains.  He wants to start this project as soon as possible because the leaks are numerous but because of his economic condition he lacks the capital to back him up which is why he’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, cement and roofing purlins.  Jorge Ardiles is very happy with the help and feels committed to repay the loan.

loans.use: to repair the roof.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María Elena de cuarenta y dos años  de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, sus dos hijos y su nieto en casa propia desde hace algún tiempo. El esposo es albañil, además María Elena y su esposo siembran maíz y frijol, entre los dos logran el sustento diario del hogar. María una mujer emprendedora, responsable y muy humilde, necesita construir en su vivienda un cuarto para la cocina ya que la casa es muy pequeña y hay poco espacio, se ahorrará la mano de obra ya que ellos trabajaran en el cuarto, espera poder realizarlo lo más pronto posible pero no posee de capital suficiente que pueda costear los gastos de los materiales por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar  ladrillo, cemento, arena, lamina, etc. María Elena está muy contenta con la ayuda y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda.
texts.en: María Elena, who is 42 years old, has been living with her life partner, her two children, and her grandson in her own home for some time. María Elena and her husband grow corn and beans, and between the two of them they support their household. María is a hardworking, responsible, and very humble woman. She needs to build a room for the kitchen in her home, since the house is very small and there is little space. They will save on labor by working on the room themselves. She hopes to be able to complete the project as soon as possible but she doesn't have enough capital to cover the cost of materials. That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI, so that she can buy bricks, cement, sand, galvanized sheet metal, etc. María Elena is very happy with the help and assures us that she will be able to pay off the debt.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and galvanized sheet metal to build a kitchen area.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a 52-year-old, married mother of five children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Lucia has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy weighing scales, plasticware, boxes and other paraphernalia.

Lucia has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy weighing scales, plasticware, boxes, and other paraphernalia.

loans.name: Hugo Bladimir

texts.es: Hugo Bladimir de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia. El es negociante de ganado, compra y vende reces, además cultiva maíz, su esposa le ayuda con el trabajo, entre los dos luchan para salir adelante; Hugo es un hombre responsable y de familia, siempre está luchando por darles una vida mejor, su vivienda necesita algunas reparaciones, primero encementar el piso porque aun está de tierra y genera mucho polvo, también quiere construir un pequeño cuarto para la cocina porque no hay suficiente espacio; espera realizar los arreglos lo más rápido posible, pues eso les dará más comodidad. Está decidido en solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar los materiales cemento, lamina galvanizada,  ladrillos,  entre otros. Hugo Bladimir agradece la ayuda y se compromete a pagar la deuda.
texts.en:
Hugo Bladimir, who is 32 years old, lives with his life partner and their three children in the home they own. He is a livestock dealer, he buys and sells cattle. He also grows corn. His wife helps him with the work. Between the two of them, they do their best to get ahead. Hugo is a responsible family man, he is always fighting for his family and trying to give them a better life. 

His house needs some repairs. First he wants to pour cement on the floors, since they are still dirt floors and generate lots of dust. He also wants to build a small room for the kitchen because there isn't enough space. He hopes to complete the renovations as soon as possible, because he will have more comfort. He decided to request a loan from FUSAI in order to buy the materials: cement, galvanized sheet metal, bricks, and other items. 

Hugo Bladimir appreciates the help and promises to pay his debt.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, galvanized sheet metal, and bricks.

loans.name: Nigina

texts.ru: Нигина трудолюбивая и умная женщина. Она родилась в 1975 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети еще е имеют источника дохода. Ее муж занимается перевозкой пассажиров. Нигина более 1 года работает в ИМОН ИНТЕРНЕШНЛ кассиром. Она выполняет свою работу качественно и имеет хорошую репутацию среди сотрудников. Нигина выделяет большое внимание на образование детей. Ее дочь поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет Коммерции. Нигина должна оплатить за учебный договор своей дочери и с такой целью она обратилась за займом. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nigina is a hardworking and clever woman. She was born in 1975. She is married with two children. The children do not yet have a source of income. Her husband is involved in passenger transport. For more than a year, Nigina has been working at IMON International as a cashier. She gets the job done efficiently and has a good reputation among her colleagues. 

Nigina puts a lot of attention into the education of her children. Her daughter enrolled in the Tajik State University of Commerce. Nigina needs to pay tuition for her daughter and with this aim applied for a loan.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's tuition

loans.name: Mehrangez

texts.ru: Мехрангез трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Ей 27 лет. Она разведена и не имеет детей. Мехрангез после развода с мужем начала новый бизнес и новую жизнь. Она занимается купле продажей аксессуары мобильных телефонов. Мехрангез данное время введет свой бизнес успешно и имеет хорошую репутацию среди других бизнесменов. Она успешно введет своё дело и стремится развевать бизнес дальше. Она хочет пополнить оборотный капитал и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки аксессуары мобильных телефонов. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Mehrangez is a hardworking and ambitious woman. She is 27 years old. She is divorced and has no children. 

After her divorce from her husband, Mehrangez began a new business and a new life. She is involved in the buying and selling of mobile phone accessories. Mehrangez in this time is successfully running her business and has a good reputation among other business people. She successfully conducts her work and strives to develop the business further. 

She wants to replenish her working capital and with that aim is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy mobile phone accessories.

loans.use: to buy mobile supplies to increase working capital

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.

She has an ice cream vending business in the Philippines, and also earns income from fish vending. Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production.

loans.name: Liliana Esther

texts.es: Liliana de 46 años de edad, habita en un municipio ubicado a orillas del mar caribe. Allí tiene una tienda donde vende ranchos, víveres, carnes, granos, verduras, lácteos, bebidas y artículos de la c canasta familiar. Liliana tiene 13 años de experiencia en este negocio, el cual inició en el año 2000, cuando viendo las necesidades sentidas en su sector, decidió vender al detalle artículos de la de consumo en los hogares, que la población compra a diario, en las medidas y proporciones que las requiere. Su idea fue tan acertada, que muy pronto empezó a generar ingresos vendiendo arroz, panela, verduras, carnes, frutas y bebidas frías. Hoy sigue en su negocio vendiendo de contado y a crédito todos los días, desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Liliana para ofrecer buenos precios, hace sus compras de contado en graneros y distribuidores mayoristas, que le ofrecen buenos descuentos, y así mismo transmite estos precios a su clientela. Su meta es continuar ampliando las ventas, para lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales;  fidelizar a su clientela, otorgándole  precios competitivos y un servicio excelente. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará abarrotes, verduras, bebidas y artículos de aseo, porque su propósito de vida, es lograr que sus 2 hijos, en las edades de 21 y 14 años,  se eduquen y alcancen un nivel universitario, para que tengan un potencial de éxito desde ahora
texts.en:
Liliana is 46 years old and lives in a municipality on the edge of the Caribbean sea. She has a store where she sells food, groceries, grains, vegetables, dairy products, drinks and basic household goods. Liliana has 13 years of experience in this business, which she started in 2000 after seeing the need for it in her community. She started selling everyday items that people buy on a regular basis, in the sizes and quantities that her customers wanted.  

Liliana’s intuition was very good, and she quickly began to make a profit. She started by selling rice, panela [unrefined whole cane sugar], vegetables, meat and cold drinks. Now she continues with her business, selling in both cash and on credit from 6 in the morning until 9 at night. To offer her customers good prices, Liliana says that she buys in cash from wholesalers and granaries that give her good discounts. She then passes the savings on to her customers. 

Liliana hopes to increase her sales so that she can help her children to become professionals. She wants to win her customer’s loyalty by offering them competitive prices and excellent service. 

Liliana is requesting her first loan from Kiva and the field partner to buy groceries, vegetables, drinks and toiletries for her store. She says that her goal in life is to see her two children, ages 21 and 14, receive a university education, so that they will realize their full potential to be successful.

loans.use: to buy groceries, vegetables, drinks and toiletries for her store.

loans.name: Ider

texts.en: Mr. Ider, 40 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi services to the local people since 2012. His wife is a nurse and works at a hospital. Their eldest son studies at high school and younger son is in Kindergarten. He is requesting a loan of 3,800,000 MNT to purchase wooden doors, tiles and a bathtub. Recently, he made renovations to his apartment, but due to lack of finances, he didn't manage to repair the house fully. After repairing his bathroom, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place without worrying about the incoming winter.

loans.use: to purchase tiles, wooden doors and a bathtub.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en: Manuel is married and is running a buy-and-sell business selling used shoes and sandals for a living. He borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC to buy more imported shoes and sandals for resale. He hopes to earn more profit to build his own house for the better living of his family in the future.

loans.use: to buy more imported used shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Wendy Selena

texts.es: Wendy Selena de dieciocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y una hija de 11 meses. Ella es ama de casa, el esposo es quien trabaja en un carwash para poder sostener el hogar; Wendy es una mujer muy humilde y esta entregada a su familia, es lo más importante que tiene por lo que quiere darles  el calor de un hogar y una mayor seguridad, necesita construir su vivienda con paredes de lámina galvanizada y compra de madera para reforzarla por el momento no lo ha logrado debido a su baja condición económica, en el terreno solo posee columnas o pilares de madera y completar la instalación de lámina en el techo. Quiere empezar el trabajo lo más pronto posible pero no posee de capital que costee los gastos por eso se decidió solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar de los materiales como lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera de pino y para la mano de obra tiene un conocido que les hará el trabajo. Wendy Selena está muy contenta con la ayuda.
texts.en:
Wendy Selena, eighteen years of age, lives with her life partner and an 11-month-old daughter. She is housewife and her husband works at a carwash to support his family.

Wendy is a very humble woman, whom is devoted to her family, which for her, it is the most important thing so she wants to give them lots of affection and security. 

She needs to finish her home with walls of galvanized sheet and to purchase wood to strengthen it. At the moment, she has not been able to due so because of her low economic conditions. Her house has four pillars of wood. She also needs to complete and finish the roof.

She wants to start the work as soon as possible but she doesn't have the capital. So, she decided to request to FUSAI, a Kiva's partner, a loan, which allows her to buy the materials like galvanized plate, nails, and pine wood. For the labor, she knows an acquaintance who will do the work. Wendy Selena is very satisfied with the help.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like galvanized plate, nails, and pine wood.

loans.name: Kobenkoun Group

texts.fr:
Kobenkoun est un regroupement de femmes de Koutiala qui vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 40 ans, sont mariées et au ont moins 4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels, les tissus, la restauration, de patte d’arachide, etc. 
Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur dixième prêt de groupe. 
Kadiatou est un membre du groupe Kobenkoun assise  la tasse  contenant les sachets de pâte d’arachide sur ses jambes.  
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des sacs d’arachide pour les transformer en pâte. Elle se procure de ces arachides à Koutiala et effectue ses ventes  en détail et au comptant à la maison et au marché et à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Kobenkoun comptent réaliser un bénéfice  moyen de 102.000CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Kadiatou  compte réaliser  110 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fond de commerce.
texts.en:
Kobenkoun is a group of women from Koutiala who live in large, traditional families with their husbands, children, and other relatives. On average, they are 40 years old and have at least four children.

This group of women has a business selling various articles such as fabric, restaurant items, peanut butter, etc. In order to grow their business, the members decided to work with Soro Yiriwaso's loan program. This is their 10th group loan. 

Kadiatou is the group member who is seated with a tub of peanuts on her lap. She would like to use her loan to buy sacks of peanuts so that she can make peanut butter. She buys her peanuts in Koutiala and sells her products out of her home and in the market to a diverse customer base that pays retail prices in cash. 

While the other group members each plan on earning an average monthly profit of 102,000 FCFA during this cycle, Mme Kadiatou plans on earning 110,000 FCFA.

Beyond the repayment of the loans, they use a part of their income to pay their personal expenses and to grow their business.

loans.use: buy peanuts.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en: As a married mother of two children, Loida works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Loida is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more items like sugar, shampoo and other groceries. Loida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and continue to send her child to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sugar, shampoo and other groceries.

loans.name: Huyen

texts.en: Huyen would like to take a further loan to buy coffee and beverages to sell from  her stall. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy coffee and many other kinds of beverages to sell at her food stall.

loans.name: Thon

texts.en: Thon would like to take another loan to buy a laundry machine to serve more customers. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine for her laundry business.

loans.name: Mary Joan

texts.en: As a married mother of three children, Mary Joan works hard to support her family. She has a plasticware sales business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store. Mary Joan is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to purchase more stocks of plasticware to resell to her customers. Mary Joan has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to build and expand her business in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of plasticware to resell.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is 49 years old and married with three children.

Melba works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like canned goods, snack foods, and other groceries.

Melba has borrowed and repaid 9 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Melba aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like canned goods, snack foods, and other groceries.

loans.name: Tsogoo

texts.en: Mr. Tsogoo, 59 years old, lives with his wife and son in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in an apartment, and he never made any renovations since living there. He has been working as a driver in the branch office of the democratic party of Mongolia for twenty six years. His wife has retired from work and gets a state pension. He is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to purchase insulation and building materials such as vacuum insulated windows, fiberglass, foam, plates and hardwood floor. After renovating his apartment, his family will live in a comfortable and warm place where heat will be preserved and energy saved.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La  señora Elizabeth se dedico  a la venta de jugo de noni ya que  paso a lo largo del tiempo por muchas circunstancias y trabas que se le interpusieron, su familia es muy  humilde por lo que  desde niña no tenía una buena situación económica, por lo que ella tuvo que trabajar desde niña dejando los estudios para así poder ayudar a su familia, además de vender estos jugos de noni,  por las noches se dedica a preparar y vender platitos de tripitas fritas. La señora Elizabeth con los ingreso que genera de estas dos actividades tiene que sustentar a sus tres hijos y a su negocio para seguir adelante, es por esta razón que ella está solicitando un préstamo para ampliar su negocio y así poder mejorar sus ingresos, así podrá ofrecerles a sus hijos una buena educación para que tengan un mejor futuro y no pasen por las necesidades que paso ella.
texts.en:
Elizabeth sells noni juices after having dealt with many circumstances and obstacles for a while that stood in her way. Her family is very humble because she grew up without economic stability. She had to work from a young age and left school in order to help her family in addition to selling noni juices. At night, she prepares and sells fried tripes.

With her income from these two jobs, Elizabeth has to take care of three children and her business to move forward. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to expand her business and improve her income. This will help her offer her children a good education so they can have a better future and so they don't go without the necessities that she did.

loans.use: to expand her business selling noni juices
